column2: Nothing last forever. So when you have it, enjoy it, appreciate it.

Solve the problem or leave the problem.
Do not live with the problem.
Never stop watering that tree.
You often feel tired, not because you've done too much, but because you've done too little of what sparks a light in you.
It doesn't matter how many resources you have. If you don't know how to use them, it'll never be enough.
Money is an illusion.
Your biggest competition is you.

Learn from the past.
Live in the Present.
Plan for the future.
Time waits for no one, use it wisely!
Better start than dream!

Now, if you know what you are worth then go out and get what you're worth.
But you got to be willing to take the hits! And not pointing fingers saying you ain't where you want to be because of him or her or anybody!
Coward do that and that aren't you. You are better than that!
Work your ass off!
There is no plan B.
There is no safety net!

Find your vision
Think Big
Ignore the naysayer.
Work your ass off.
Give back, don't just take.
Change the world

Love yourself
Do good
Always forgive
Harm no one
Be Positive
Find a place that brings you peace.
Never be controlled by your past, money, negativity and other people.
You spend most of your life inside your head. Make it a nice place to be.

Don't be a parrot in life
Be an eagle.
A parrot talks way too much but can't fly high.
But an eagle is silent and has the power to touch the sky.
You cannot undo the moves but you can make the next step better.

Don't forget to think ahead
Do important things early
Always follow your gut
Get a full night rest
Start small and build.

Step into the present moment
Identify the root cause
Focus on getting things done
Invest in your personal development.

I will focus on ...
I am grateful for ...
I will let go of ...

Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress.
Working hard for something we love is called passion.
Be your own boss!

Life isn't about finding yourself.
Life is about creating yourself.
Failure is when you don't try.
Never look back, there is nothing there for you.
If you can face great fears in life, nothing will stop you.

Are you intent on shaping your world?
Are you willing to take risks?
Do you have faith in the future?
Do you listen to your gut?
Before you build for others, build your castle first.

Morning Habits
Hydrate first
Exercise
Plan your day the night before
If today was your last day, what would you do?

Sucessful Habits
Workout
Self-control - don't overreact
Compete with yourself
Continuously save money
Read more books
Stay humble
Enjoy freedom
Be creative

Money returns but time won't.
Invest in yourself.
A salary is just the drug they give you when they want you to give up on your dreams.
I would rather be a devil in alliance with truth, than an angel in alliance with falsehood.
Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing themselves.
Cherish the everyday moments
It's never too late to fulfill a dream.
You are too concerned with what was and what will be. There is a saying, 'Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. But today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.'
You can fail at doing what you don't want. So you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.

If you are depressed, you are living in the past.
If you are anxious, you are living in the future.
If you are at peace, you are living in the present.
So many of us choose our path out of fear disguised as practicality.
Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragement, and impossibilities. It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
The sword has no strength unless the hand that holds it has courage.
Stop trying to change people and focus on changing yourself.
Accept people for who they are.
Nothing is more important in this world than you and your family.
Learn to let go, accept the situation and move on.
We think too much and feel too little.
It is not about money that makes us rich, its simplicity, love, compassion, friendships, values, family that makes our lives rich.
What are you willing to struggle for?
As long as you believe in yourself, there will always be a way for you.
You don't find happiness, you create it.
Never lose your inner child.
Make sure that what you chase in life is worth dying for.
We always work for a better tomorrow. But when tomorrow comes, instead of enjoying, we again think of a better tomorrow! Let's have a better tomorrow today!
Don't be afraid to choose a different path than others.
Stop playing small. Think big, act big.
You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
Good judgement comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
Ever tried, ever failed. No matter. Try again, fail again. Fail better.

The pessimist complains about the wind.
The optimist expects it to change;
The realist adjusts the sails.
It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.

The only way that we can live is if we grow.
The only way we can grow is if we change.
The only way we can change is if we learn.
The only way we can learn is if we are exposed.
And the only way that we are exposed is if we throw ourselves into the open.

Fill your life with adventures, not things.
Have stories to tell, not stuff to show.

To be nobody-but-yourself-in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody but yourself-means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight, and never stop fighting.

Never be a Prisoner of your past.
It was just a lesson, not a life Sentence.

Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—
I took the one less traveled by,
And that has made all the difference.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanaent.
Succss is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
If your head tells you one thing, and your heart tells you another, before you do anything, you should first decide whether you have a better head or a better heart.
Just do!
Start each day with a task completed. (Make your bed)

Find someone to help you through life.
Respect everyone
Life is not fair and you will fail often.

Take risks
Step up when times are the toughest.

Face up to the bullies.
Lift up the down trodden.
Never ever give up.
Weak people revenge. Strong people forgive. Intelligent people ignore.
